Entries.cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_SlimeTote: Dear @,^I've noticed you've been getting quite good at handling those slimes in the mines. I think you're ready to learn something special.^Here's a recipe for a Slime Totem that can help you find more of them when you need to.^    -Marlon%item craftingRecipe cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_SlimeTotem %%
Entries.cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_BugTotemR: Dear @,^Your skill at exterminating those pesky cave insects hasn't gone unnoticed. I've got something that might interest you.^This recipe for a Bug Totem will help you find more when you need them.^    -Marlon%item craftingRecipe cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_BugTotem %%
Entries.cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_SkeletonT: Dear @,^I've been watching your progress with those skeletons in the mines. Impressive work.^Here's a recipe for a Skeleton Totem - use it wisely.^    -Marlon%item craftingRecipe cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_SkeletonTotem %%
Entries.cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_BatTotemR: Dear @,^Your prowess at dealing with those cave bats is remarkable. I think you're ready for this.^This Bat Totem recipe should help you find more of them when needed.^    -Marlon%item craftingRecipe cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_BatTotem %%
Entries.cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_SpiritTot: Dear @,^Your ability to handle those shadow creatures is impressive. Here's something that might help you find more of them.^Take this Spirit Totem recipe, but be careful - these beings are not to be underestimated.^    -Marlon%item craftingRecipe cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_SpiritTotem %%
Entries.cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_DuggyTote: Dear @,^Those duggies giving you trouble? Well, now you can find them when you need to.^Here's a Duggy Totem recipe that might come in handy.^    -Marlon%item craftingRecipe cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_DuggyTotem %%
Entries.cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_DustSprit: Dear @,^Those dust sprites are tricky little things, aren't they? I've got something that might help you track them down.^Here's a recipe for a Dust Sprite Totem.^    -Marlon%item craftingRecipe cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_DustSpriteTotem %%
Entries.cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_CrabTotem: Dear @,^I see you've become quite adept at dealing with those rock crabs. Here's a special recipe just for you.^This Crab Totem will help you find more when you need them.^    -Marlon%item craftingRecipe cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_CrabTotem %%
Entries.cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_MummyTote: Dear @,^Your encounters with the desert's ancient guardians have not gone unnoticed. This might help you find them again.^Here's a Mummy Totem recipe - handle with care.^    -Marlon%item craftingRecipe cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_MummyTotem %%
Entries.cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_DinosaurT: Dear @,^Those prehistoric beasts are quite something, aren't they? I think you're ready for this.^Here's a Dinosaur Totem recipe. Use it to find more of those ancient creatures.^    -Marlon%item craftingRecipe cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_DinosaurTotem %%
Entries.cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_SerpentTo: Dear @,^Your skill at handling those deadly serpents is remarkable. I have something special for you.^This Serpent Totem recipe will help you find more of them - if you dare.^    -Marlon%item craftingRecipe cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_SerpentTotem %%
Entries.cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_MagmaSpri: Dear @,^Those magma sprites are quite the challenge, but you've proven yourself capable.^Here's a Magma Sprite Totem recipe. Be careful with this one - it's hot stuff.^    -Marlon%item craftingRecipe cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_MagmaSpriteTotem %%

Changes.LogName: Adding items to Adventure Guild shop
